name: Turgor
description:
Who are you?
Why do you feel this way?
What is happening to the people around you?

Your attempts to escape The Greenhouse just may be futile.

A heavy-ambiance horror visual novel prototype made for the Portland Indie Game Squad's June Summer Slow Jams challenge based on the themes "Minigames" and "The World Is Alive."

Credits -
Backgrounds: @nyssaoru
Audio: @surreal_VGM
Character Art: @rob_dunsmuir
Programming & Writing: @gamewillpdx
